name: Smoky Gouda Cheese Dip
author: Irish Kathleen
summary: Oh my gosh, is this good! Rich and savory with just a little bit of heat. Even if you've never been a Gouda fan, this will make a believer out of you. I can't bring it anywhere without people begging for the recipe. Serve warm with baguette slices, crackers, or pita chips. Give it a try!
ingredients: 1 cup shredded Gouda cheese with chipotle peppers (such as Boar's Head®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix mayonnaise, smoked Gouda, Gouda with chipotle peppers, onion, and bacon together in a bowl; spread into a baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until mixture is bubbly and lightly browned along the edges, 15 to 20 minutes
